author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Elanix Biotechnologies Raises EUR 1.1 Mln From Capital Increase
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Elanix Biotechnologies AG:
* DGAP-ADHOC: ELANIX BIOTECHNOLOGIES AG: ELANIX BIOTECHNOLOGIES AG PLACES A TOTAL OF 300,019 SHARES FROM THE CURRENT CASH CAPITAL INCREASE AND SIGNS A TERM SHEET FOR FINANCING FACILITY OF UP TO EUR 11 MILLION
* GROSS PROCEEDS OF EUR 1.125 MILLION * SHARES PLACED AT A SUBSCRIPTION PRICE OF EUR 3.75 * ‍SHARE CAPITAL OF ELANIX WILL INCREASE TO A TOTAL OF 7,099,219 SHARES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
